title: Sans Serif for Newspaper Headlines
content:
I am working on the redesign of a daily newspaper and wanted your opinions about sans serif type families for headlines. We are testing Grade Three Fb Poynter Old Style for body copy and are very pleased with the results. How does everybody feel about the Knockout family for headlines?

 [‹ Stroke weights - should I really be messing with the natural order?](http://web.archive.org/web/20080115232539/http:/typophile.com/node/19545 "Go to previous forum topic") [Western-Horror-Themed Graphic Novel Body Text? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080115232539/http:/typophile.com/node/19515 "Go to next forum topic")
author: jonmelville
